admin_superuser: An administrator, who is allowed to do everything.
admin_helpdesk: A helpdesk user, who is allowed to manage all token stuff.
authentication_push_ssl_enable: Enable SSL verification during authentication for PUSH.
authentication_push_ssl_disable: Disable SSL verification during authentication for PUSH.
authentication_push_title_on_mobile: Set the title of the notification the user sees on his mobile phone.
authentication_push_text_on_mobile: Set the text of the notification the user sees on his mobile phone.
authentication_reset_all_user_tokens: Reset the failcounter of all tokens if a user authenticates successfully.
enrollment_push_firebase_config_poll_onl: Set PUSH firebase configuration to 'poll only'.
enrollment_tokenlabel: Set the tokenlabel of a Google Authenticator to a sensible value during enrollment.
user_token_enrollment: Define user rights for token enrollment.
user_token_management: Define user rights for token management.
webui_admin_enable_dashboard: Enable dashboard as start screen for admins when logging in.
webui_admin_hide_welcome: Hide the welcome dialogue from the administrator.
webui_login_mode_authentication_privacyi: Users need to authenticate against privacyIDEA.
webui_login_mode_authentication_userstor: Users need to authenticate against their userstore.
webui_logout_time: Set WebUI logout time to 5 minutes.
